gameframework.particles

Class ParticleGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameframework.particles.ParticleGroup
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParticleGroupMock

    public class ParticleGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a group of particles. Every particles inside this group will have a unique id that could be used by behaviors A group is created when you call ParticleEmitter.emit(java.awt.Color, java.awt.Rectangle, int, gameframework.particles.behaviors.ParticleBehavior)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor

      Adds a particle to the group
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draw every particles that are still alive in the group
      void drawParticle(Particle particle, java.awt.Graphics graphics)
      Draw a single particle on a Graphics
      boolean isEmpty()
      Determines if the group is empty (has no particle alive)

        Adds a particle to the group
        Parameters:
        color - Color of this particle

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Determines if the group is empty (has no particle alive)
        Returns:
